channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Jon Snow’s sword and dragon skulls are among hundreds of ‘Game of Thrones’ props up for auction
item.description: Fans of “Game of Thrones” can now battle it out themselves as 2,000 items from the series go up for auction.

item.title: 3 missing in Connecticut town after boating accident
item.description: Authorities in Connecticut say three people are missing, without life jackets, after a boat they were on reportedly hit a jetty.

item.title: The Fed welcomes a ‘soft landing’ even if many Americans don’t feel like cheering
item.description: When Jerome Powell delivered a high-profile speech last month, the Federal Reserve chair came the closest he ever had to declaring that the inflation surge that gripped the nation for three painful years was now essentially defeated.
